excerpt:
Q - ███████ Strikes
Base damage: 80/120/160/200/240 ⇒ 90/130/170/210/250

W - Windwall
Cooldown: 26/24/22/20/18s ⇒ 30/28/26/24/22s

This █████ continues to dominate the top lane and mid lane, particularly after picking up Immortal Shieldbow.

Base Stats
Base HP: 570 ⇒ 530
Armor: 24 ⇒ 21

R - ██████'s Requiem
Cooldown: 200/180/160s ⇒ 200/180/160s (unchanged)
Cost: 100 mana ⇒ No cost

Lane phase survivability reduced to compensate for the global ultimate remaining strong.

█████████ (Active)
Damage: 100-200 (based on level) ⇒ 80-180
Healing: 20-40% ⇒ 15-35%

Total Cost: 3200 ⇒ 3400

Item power reduced across the board as it provided too much sustain to its primary users.

Passive - ██████ Form
████ gained per stack: 3 ⇒ 4 (Maximum ████: 750 ⇒ 1000)

Q - Baleful Strike
Damage: 70/110/150/190/230 ⇒ 80/120/160/200/240

Small ██████ is big.

Q - Decimating Smash
Minimum damage: 40/70/100/130/160 ⇒ 50/80/110/140/170
Max damage: 120/210/300/390/480 ⇒ 150/240/330/420/510

R - ████ Line
████ gets to punch again but harder.

E - Allure
Base cooldown: 14/13/12/11/10s ⇒ 12/11/10/9/8s

R - Prime Directive
Mana drain per second: 80 ⇒ 60

███████ returns to viability in the jungle after her sustained combat numbers are improved.

Total Cost: 2900 ⇒ 3000
Active shield: 250-450 ⇒ 200-400
Bonus armor: 20 ⇒ 15

█████████ has been overperforming as a defensive option for marksmen and is having its shield and armor reduced.

W - Pix, Faerie Companion
Shield: 80/110/140/170/200 ⇒ 70/100/130/160/190

R - Wild Growth
Knockup duration: 0.75s ⇒ 0.6s

████'s support dominant playstyle is toned down to allow more counterplay in late-game teamfights.

Passive - ████████ Patience
Stacks required for bonus damage: 2 ⇒ 3

W - Silver Bolts
Bolt damage percent: 10/12/14/16/18% ⇒ 8/10/12/14/16%

Silver bolts were shredding through objectives too quickly.

Q - Dark Sphere
Damage: 70/110/150/190/230 ⇒ 80/120/160/200/240
Cooldown: 4s ⇒ 3.5s

███████ felt undertuned at all skill levels after her mobility nerfs, so base ability damage is increased.

Total Cost: 3000 ⇒ 2800
Ability Haste: 15 ⇒ 20
Death Timer Reduction: 12% ⇒ 10%

█████████ Codex is made more accessible to encourage its use on a wider range of enchanters.

R - Explosive Charge
Bomb click-to-detonate range: 650 ⇒ 550
Stacks to reach max damage: 3 ⇒ 4

Passive - Headshots
Stack accumulation time reset on move: 4s ⇒ 3s

████████ lane bully power toned down in extended trades.
